'''"Elation of Social Drinking"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Elation of Social Drinking" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
